security: Releasing intelligence sources and methods would expose sensitive intelligence sources and methods. Quoting directly: "SECRET--WARNING NOT ICE SENS IT IVE INTELLIGENCE SOURCES AND METHODS INVOLVED --NOT RELEASABLE TO FOREIGN NATIONALS"
summary: This document concerns Ignazio Palomera Perez, a Cuban national, who obtained a Nicaraguan exit permit to travel to the United States in March 1976, as indicated by Nicaraguan official sources.
summary_one_paragraph: A CIA document, dated March 15, 1976, sent to the US Secret Service with information to the FBI, relays that Ignazio Palomera Perez, a Cuban national born in Havana on March 16, 1940, obtained a Nicaraguan exit permit on March 17, 1976, to travel to the United States; this information was obtained from an official Nicaraguan service. The document references a Secret Service advance from San Jose, dated February 21, 1976 and cautions that it contains sensitive intelligence sources and methods not releasable to foreign nationals.
title: OBA, ASSOC, PEREZ, PALOMERA IGNAZIO, TRA, US, ATTEND, FATHER'S FUNERAL
